frontmatter.title: Strawberry Fair Line-Up
frontmatter.subtitle: Welcome to The Strawberry Fair Revolution! We are excited to finally announce the line-up for 2023!

markdownRemark.html:
Please remember to donate! All donations are really appreciated, as they help to keep the Fair free!
